response.original_title: The Word Universe: A Journey to West Africa
response.overview: The filmmaker travels to West Africa to search for his friend, a Liberian man who fled the horror of Liberia along with hundreds of thousands of others. The journey probes into a world overrun with warring factions, refugees, arms dealers and profiteers.
response.tagline: One African. One American. And the war that came between them.
response.title: The Word Universe: A Journey to West Africa
